Room.Description: You are inside a Dragonarmy tent, hastily erected amidst the others. This is just one of the easily accessible, but there are others ... there are hundreds upon hundreds of others. The inside of the tent is fairly nondescript; it's a white canvas tent, with a small cot in the corner and a small footlocker for keeping spare rations and personal belongings in. The entrance to the tent is back north.

Room.Name: Inside a tent
Room.Description: You are inside a Dragonarmy tent, hastily erected amidst the others. This is just one of the easily accessible, but there are others ... there are hundreds upon hundreds of others. The inside of the tent is fairly nondescript; it's a white canvas tent, with a small cot in the corner and a small footlocker for keeping spare rations and personal belongings in. The entrance to the tent is back south.

Room.Name: Inside a tent
Room.Description: You are inside a Dragonarmy tent, hastily erected amidst the others. This is just one of the easily accessible, but there are others ... there are hundreds upon hundreds of others. The inside of the tent is fairly nondescript; it's a white canvas tent, with a small cot in the corner and a small footlocker for keeping spare rations and personal belongings in. The entrance to the tent is back west.

Room.Name: Inside a tent
Room.Description: You are inside a Dragonarmy tent, hastily erected amidst the others. This is just one of the easily accessible, but there are others ... there are hundreds upon hundreds of others. The inside of the tent is fairly nondescript; it's a white canvas tent, with a small cot in the corner and a small footlocker for keeping spare rations and personal belongings in. The entrance to the tent is back north.

Room.Name: A villager's home
Room.Description: You stand inside one of the few houses left standing after the destruction of Neraka that hasn't been abandoned in anger and fear. It looks lived-in and poor, and the evil of the Temple permeates this house like the very air. Very little decorates this house except a table and a few chairs.

Room.Name: Southern path outside the village
Room.Description: You walk on a narrow dirt path outside the village, riddled with holes and stones. It is travelled significantly less than the rest of the roads of Neraka, but they are still worn and hard. Not much activity goes on here, as the south seems more exposed to the elements than any other part of the area. The sun is hotter, the wind is stronger and the dust is drier, but nothing can take your mind away from the Temple, leering at you like a mirage.

Room.Name: Southern path outside the village
Room.Description: You walk on a narrow dirt path outside the village, riddled with holes and stones. It is travelled significantly less than the rest of the roads of Neraka, but they are still worn and hard. Not much activity goes on here, as the south seems more exposed to the elements than any other part of the area. The sun is hotter, the wind is stronger and the dust is drier, but nothing can take your mind away from the Temple, leering at you like a mirage.

Room.Name: Herb Store
Room.Description: You enter the store to find it empty and devoid of any herbs whatsoever. Even the smell of the plants is gone now, washed away in the brutal heat. Empty jars line shelves on the walls. It seems that the owner packed up quickly and left. With what happened to the store to the north, it's no wonder. The exit to this empty store is back to the north.

Room.Name: A half-levelled house
Room.Description: Half of this house still stands, the other does not. The disruption and earthquake caused by the rising of the Temple split it in twain long ago. It still stands, for no other reason than that it is a harmless ruin. Dry, dusty wind blows eerily through the stones above and below you, and timbers creak and moan under the weight of the stone. Half of a door will take you back west to the village street.

Room.Name: A half-levelled house
Room.Description: Half of this house still stands, the other does not. The disruption and earthquake caused by the rising of the Temple split it in twain long ago. It still stands, for no other reason than that it is a harmless ruin. Dry, dusty wind blows eerily through the stones above and below you, and timbers creak and moan under the weight of the stone. Half of a door will take you back east to the village street.

Room.Name: Streets of Neraka
Room.Description: You walk on a road that leads through the damned village of Neraka. You can see the black mass of the Temple from here. Try as you might, the image of the foul black construction is etched in your mind and you cannot and will never forget it. To the south, the road continues, and it looks like a dead-end to the west.

Room.Name: Streets of Neraka
Room.Description: You walk on a road that leads through the damned village of Neraka. You can see the black mass of the Temple from here. Try as you might, the image of the foul black construction is etched in your mind and you cannot and will never forget it. You have reached a dead-end in the road. Back east, the street winds.

Room.Name: Streets of Neraka
Room.Description: You walk on an north-south road that parallels the Temple, which is far to the west. Try as you might, the image of the foul black construction is etched in your mind and you cannot and will never forget it. To the south is a small intersection, and the road stretches onwards to the north.

Room.Name: Streets of Neraka
Room.Description: You walk on an north-south road that parallels the Temple, which is far to the west. Try as you might, the image of the foul black construction is etched in your mind and you cannot and will never forget it. To the south is a small intersection, and the road stops here. To the north is a rather suspicious-looking building, and to the west lies some sort of storage facility.

Room.Name: The Black Market
Room.Description: This is the Black Market of Neraka. Here, for the right price, you can buy slaves from all over the realm. They are most notably warriors, although some prisoners of war have been taken hostage as a threat to the land. Slavemasters stand here and there, ushering slaves onto and off of the auction block with cruel whips.

Room.Name: Load slaves here!
Room.Description: In theory, this is where the slaves should be kept, if the Romdocs are right. If you're here, you must be a slave. Just behave and wait to be sold. Or maybe the gods will answer your prayers for release.

Room.Name: Empty Storeroom
Room.Description: This storeroom is hollow and vast, and holding nothing, not even a single box. It does, however, act as an oven, storing all the heat until you're baking inside your armor. This was probably used at some time or another by the citizens of Neraka to store crops for the winter months, but it is now empty, and a scarce few citizens remain.

Room.Name: The mess tent
Room.Description: You are inside the massive grey mess tent, and it is indeed a mess. Food is strewn about chaotically, and many soldiers are eating hungrily at long wooden tables. You could probably sit down unnoticed and eat a meal as well, if you could stomach the food, whatever it is. It looks like a thin stew made of organ meats and other nasty things. It's even hotter in here than it is outside. The mess tent continues through a flap in the tent to the west, and the entrance is back to the east.

Room.Name: Mess kitchen
Room.Description: This is where some of the cooking for the encampment takes place. Looking about, there are about thirty pots on over fires. It seems like there's only one cook, too. You can hear the shouts of the mess hall from here. This room stinks badly and is hotter still than the rest of the tent. The "meats" that you see on small tables and in cloth sacks look more like severed body parts and entrails than anything. Maybe you should leave before you get sick all over the place and the cook decides to throw that in, too. The doorway is back east.

Room.Name: Streets of Neraka
Room.Description: You walk on a north-south road that parallels the Temple, which is immediately to the west, so close that you can touch it. Try as you might, the image of the foul black construction is etched in your mind and you cannot and will never forget it. On either side of you are ruined homes, a grim reminder of what happened in Neraka many years ago.

Room.Name: Streets of Neraka
Room.Description: You walk on a north-south road that parallels the Temple, which is immediately to the west, so close that you can touch it. Try as you might, the image of the foul black construction is etched in your mind and you cannot and will never forget it. To the east is a house that is half-ruined, and to the north, there are two totally destroyed homes.

Room.Name: A half-levelled house
Room.Description: Half of this house still stands, the other does not. The disruption and earthquake caused by the rising of the Temple split it in twain long ago. It still stands, for no other reason than that it is a harmless ruin. Dry, dusty wind blows eerily through the stones above and below you, and timbers creak and moan under the weight of the stone. Half of a door will take you back west to the village street.

Room.Name: A ruined home
Room.Description: In this rubble is great sadness. Personal items are strewn about in the fallen house, memories of a long time ago before the Dark Queen's coming into this place. The clothing has rotted and the beds are infested with vermin, and under the rubble, you are sure you can see a skeleton before you turn away back to the street.

Room.Name: A ruined home
Room.Description: In this rubble is great sadness. Personal items are strewn about in the fallen house, memories of a long time ago before the Dark Queen's coming into this place. The clothing has rotted and the beds are infested with vermin, and under the rubble, you are sure you can see a skeleton before you turn away back to the street.

Room.Name: Inside a tent
Room.Description: You are inside a Dragonarmy tent, hastily erected amidst the others. This is just one of the easily accessible, but there are others ... there are hundreds upon hundreds of others. The inside of the tent is fairly nondescript; it's a white canvas tent, with a small cot in the corner and a small footlocker for keeping spare rations and personal belongings in. The entrance to the tent is back west.

Room.Name: Inside a tent
Room.Description: You are inside a Dragonarmy tent, hastily erected amidst the others. This is just one of the easily accessible, but there are others ... there are hundreds upon hundreds of others. The inside of the tent is fairly nondescript; it's a white canvas tent, with a small cot in the corner and a small footlocker for keeping spare rations and personal belongings in. The entrance to the tent is back east.

Room.Name: A necromancer's room
Room.Description: Inside this dark, shadowy room lurks the stench and feel of death. The only light is given from a short, fat candle that is placed inside a dry, white skull. A small bed is next to the wall, and a desk is next to it, filled with all sorts of powders, scrolls, wands, and the like. A few books sit on the desk, too, mostly note books filled with incoherent writings. A spare black robe is folded neatly on the bed. The door behind you has closed on its own, and you wonder if someone else is in the room with you ...

Room.Name: A mage's room
Room.Description: Inside this dark, shadowy room is the feeling of hate and darkness. The only light is given from a short, fat candle that is burning slowly atop a black disk, probably a symbol of Nuitari. A small bed is next to the wall, and a desk is next to it, filled with all sorts of powders, scrolls, wands, and the like. A few books sit on the desk, too, mostly note books filled with incoherent writings. A spare black robe is folded neatly on the bed.

Room.Name: A cleric's room
Room.Description: You stand in the bare room of a cleric of some sort. The only decorations are a medal from the Dragonarmy and a bearing on the wall with the mark of five clenched dragon claws. The only furniture is a wooden bed and small desk beside it. A few empty bottles sit on the desk, probably containing magical potions at one time or another. A small black candle is on the desk along with an opened parchment letter. The walls are black, and you get the feeling that someone is watching you.

ExtraDescription.Description: The letter reads: "To Nastul, High Cleric of Takhisis: We wish to commend your work and we therefore send you this magically enchanted mace, one which will make you more powerful in battle. We also give you this medal for your loyal service to Her Dark Majesty. In addition, you are ordered to report to the Dragon Highlord meeting as soon as you can. There is word that the Knights of Solamnia are on the march here, and we would like to investigate this. You will be briefed before the meeting. Signed, Highlord Kitiara"
The medal is a round disc of metal engraved with runes that mean nothing to you. It also bears the mark of Takhisis.

Room.Name: A cleric's room
Room.Description: You stand in the bare room of a cleric of some sort. The only decoration is a bearing on the wall with the mark of five clenched dragon claws. The only furniture is a wooden bed and small desk beside it. A few empty bottles sit on the desk, probably containing magical potions at one time or another. A small black candle is smoldering on the desk. The walls are black, and you get the feeling that someone is watching you.

Room.Name: Before a massive throne
Room.Description: You stand before a massive black throne, one adorned with dragon heads and elven skulls. In the center is pitch-blackness that you cannot see into and no light penetrates. You get the feeling that you are treading on very sacred, very dangerous ground ... especially when you realize why nobody sits here. This is the throne of Takhisis, Queen of Darkness.

Room.Name: Streets of Neraka
Room.Description: You walk on a road that leads through the damned village of Neraka. You can see the black mass of the Temple from here. Try as you might, the image of the foul black construction is etched in your mind and you cannot and will never forget it. The street bends north and west here.

Room.Name: Streets of Neraka
Room.Description: You walk on a road that leads through the damned village of Neraka. You can see the black mass of the Temple from here. Try as you might, the image of the foul black construction is etched in your mind and you cannot and will never forget it. To the south the road bends, and to the west lies the outer corridor of the Temple.

Room.Name: Atop the arch
Room.Description: You stand on the inside of the massive stone arch that was erected to honor the coming of armies from all directions. However, the work order got lost in paperwork and the arch was constructed at the wrong road. It was supposed to be built on the northern road into Neraka, since only one army would be coming from the east, that of Highlord Lucien, who still has not arrived in the village.

Room.Name: The Dusty Trail to Neraka
Room.Description: This looks like a Dragonarmy checkpoint, but it's been deserted. The only thing left is a massive gate that's closed off, blocking the east-west road. It's unlocked and you could probably open it pretty easily. But never mind that -- it's not like the Army of Takhisis to leave something like this laying around. They're good at making things disappear -- far too good. There are tracks leading up to the gate and beyond it, but the gate shows no sign of ever having been opened recently. A high wall of stone extends to a steep rock face to the north and south, preventing any but the most skilled of thieves and assassins from getting past unnoticed, but the days of necessity for that are long gone.

Room.Name: The Forge
Room.Description: You stand within the forge itself. Though the fires here have not been lit for years, the heat still rages on. It is almost unbearable, even though the heat is not physical. It is a heat of hate, of anger, of rage at being contained here. A dark presence invades your mind, and you get the distinct feeling that you are not alone and are being watched.

NPC.name: ariakas highlord dragon lord
NPC.description: Highlord Ariakas is seated here, dressed in his ceremonial Dragonarmor. Something about the man makes you uneasy and afraid. On his head he wears the Crown, making him the most powerful being here ... or should that be mortal?
NPC.longDescription: Ariakas the Dragon Highlord is seated on his throne here.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood DetectIllusion

NPC.name: kitiara dragon lord
NPC.description: This is Kitiara ... half-sister of Raistlin and Caramon, and high-ranking officer in the Army of Takhisis. She has had many lovers in and out of the army and uses her "skills" to win favor and influence the greater powers.
NPC.longDescription: Kitiara the Dragon Lord appraises you, seduction in her eyes.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood DetectIllusion

NPC.name: berem green stone gem
NPC.description: This is the fabled Berem, the Green Gemstone Man, the Everman. No matter how often he dies he will always return to life, cursed eternally by the Dark Queen. He knows his search must end here in the temple, but the trail turned cold here.
NPC.longDescription: Berem stands here, a wild look in his eyes.

NPC.name: girl serving bartender
NPC.description: She looks at you warily; she's apparently seen too many drunken soldiers in the past few days to trust many people at all -- men or women. She wearily asks you with a smile, "What will you be drinking?"
NPC.longDescription: There is a serving girl pushing through the crowds here.

NPC.name: draconian soldier blue
NPC.description: This is one of the many draconian soldiers under Highlord Kitiara's command, dressed in the midnight blue armor that designates those in her unit. It looks vicious and snarls at you as you approach, itching for a fight.
NPC.longDescription: A draconian soldier dressed in blue stands here.

NPC.name: draconian soldier red
NPC.description: This draconian wears the red dragonscale and insignia of Ariakas, the highest of the Highlords. He glares about with contempt, feeling somewhat more powerful because of his Highlord's position.
NPC.longDescription: A draconian soldier dressed in red dragonscale eyes you dangerously.

NPC.name: draconian soldier black
NPC.description: This draconian wears black armor ... perhaps of the Dark Queen herself. No Black Highlord has ever been seen or heard of before, at least not by name. A complete mystery, but this draconian is prepared to give his life for whatever master he serves.
NPC.longDescription: A draconian in black armor gazes at you with burning eyes.

NPC.name: draconian soldier white
NPC.description: The draconian is clad in the white dragonarmor of Highlord Lucien, a strange irony. Besides the torches, the armor is probably the brightest thing in the entire compound. But the dark soul beneath the armor is not white -- nor does it care a damn about the light other than to stop it utterly.
NPC.longDescription: A dark draconian stands here, clad in bright white armor.

NPC.name: draconian soldier green
NPC.description: This draconian is under the command of Highlord Toede, one of the most cowardly and incompetent Highlords ... but also one of the most sinister and evil. As such, this draconian has taken it upon himself to be evil and sinister.
NPC.longDescription: A draconian outfitted in vile green lurks about.

NPC.name: human man native citizen
NPC.description: This citizen wants nothing more than to rid the village of the accursed Temple and Takhisis' Army of Dragons and Draconians ... but from the look of things, that won't happen soon.
NPC.longDescription: A citizen of Neraka stands here, completely at loss.

NPC.name: draconian soldier guard
NPC.description: This draconian has been assigned the task of guarding Neraka from those who do not follow the path of darkness. He looks grim and enjoys his job thoroughly, tightening his grip on his long, black spear as you examine him.
NPC.longDescription: A draconian guard looks up at you from his post.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistVnum

NPC.name: butcher man
NPC.description: This butcher has been cast into dismay as he has watched his best meat stolen from him. But he works on to provide the remaining people of Neraka and those in the Dragonarmy who have the money with the best meat possible ... which isn't very good.
NPC.longDescription: The butcher stands here, cutting meat.

NPC.name: bartender man
NPC.description: He's got a scowl on his face and glares at you, too. You're just one more customer who's going to drink away his drink. He flashes a dagger from his belt, telling you to be sure and pay for what you drink.
NPC.longDescription: The bartender is here, ready to take your order.

NPC.name: dragon chromatic enormous
NPC.description: This chromatic dragon isn't like the others that you've seen. It is all the colors of the chromatic dragons: red, black, green, blue, and white. It must be a pet of the Dark Queen Herself ... She of Many Colors and None.
NPC.longDescription: An enormous chromatic dragon is laying atop a single precious gem.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Flying DarkVision

NPC.name: armorer man
NPC.description: This man looks up at you as you look at him. He bends over a white-hot piece of metal that looks like it's going to be a piece of armor. With a free hand, he wipes sweat and soot from his face and keeps on working.
NPC.longDescription: The Neraka Armorer bends over his forge, beating out another armor plate.

NPC.name: mercenary human soldier
NPC.description: This human mercenary is one of the many hundreds hired by the Dragonarmy to build up their forces for an attack. He wears the traditional armor of a mercenary, hammered iron plate. He eyes you with disdain, and keeps walking about in the crowd.
NPC.longDescription: A human mercenary stands here, clad in the traditional armor of mercenaries.

NPC.name: mercenary minotaur cow
NPC.description: This minotaur mercenary is one of the many hundreds hired by the Dragonarmy to build up their forces for an attack. He wears the traditional armor of a mercenary, hammered iron plate. He eyes you with disdain, and keeps pushing his way through the crowd, muscles bulging, massive hands clenched into fists.
NPC.longDescription: A minotaur mercenary looks about, clad in traditional mercenary armor.

NPC.name: draconian archer soldier
NPC.description: It peers at you with cold green eyes and hisses, then goes back to watching. Bow in hand, with an arrow always nocked, it is ready to fire the first shots at an oncoming enemy army, and to sound the call to arms.
NPC.longDescription: A draconian archer stands here, looking out over the village.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistVnum

NPC.name: slavemaster master man black
NPC.description: He is a cruel and merciless man, and if he had joined the Dragonarmy as an officer, he surely would have been a torturer. He never hesitates to use his sadistic whip for any reason, even if it is just to kill a fly that bothers him. He now profits excessively at the Dragonarmy's successes.
NPC.longDescription: The head slavemaster stands on a box, offering to you the finest slaves in Krynn.

NPC.name: draconian guard
NPC.description: This draconian has landed the lucky job of checking all the papers of the soldiers returning from leave and checking in new prisoners of war. Lucky, that is, in the sense that he's not fighting. Unlucky in the sense that the job is boring.
NPC.longDescription: A draconian guard looks at you with vile green eyes.

NPC.name: slave warrior pet
NPC.longDescription: A warrior slave stands here, with an iron collar about his neck.

NPC.name: dwarf slave pet dwarven
NPC.longDescription: A dwarven slave stands here, an iron collar about his neck.

NPC.name: slave peasant pet
NPC.longDescription: A peasant slave stands here, an iron collar about his neck.

NPC.name: slave half halfelf halfelven pet
NPC.longDescription: A half-elven slave looks about, with an iron collar around his neck.

NPC.name: knight slave pet
NPC.longDescription: A knight slave is here, iron chains attached to his remaining armor.

NPC.name: slave goblin pet
NPC.longDescription: A small goblin slave looks at his feet, being led by an iron chain.

NPC.name: cook fat hobgoblin big
NPC.description: This goblin might not be the best cook but he's the fastest at it, and when a draconian is hungry, it wants its food right then. The cook is wearing an apron and is stirring a large cooking pot, dumping in all kinds of ... well, they could be called meats ... maybe ...
NPC.longDescription: A fat hobgoblin cook stands here, stirring ... something.

NPC.name: jailer hobgoblin fat
NPC.description: This hobgoblin is the jailer of the Dungeon. He's also a torturer on the side. He's fat and ugly, much bigger than his goblin cronies. A scimitar is in his hand, ready to cut the hand off any prisoner who annoys him.
NPC.longDescription: A fat hobgoblin jailer looks about with a sneer.

NPC.name: cleric Takhisis dark figure Nastul
NPC.description: This evil man glares at you with death on his lips, but he's not ready to use it yet. His hand goes down to the mace by his side, but he passes it off as if he were scratching an itch. On his forearm, there is a marking of five clenched dragon claws.
NPC.longDescription: A dark figure dressed in red and black robes glares at you.

NPC.name: hatchling baby draconian
NPC.description: This draconian will be full-grown and vicious in less than 6 hours ... but until then it will be fairly small and defenseless, an easy kill. Terror flashes in its eyes when it sees you, but it quickly grows arrogant and defiant.
NPC.longDescription: A draconian hatchling pulls itself along the floor with its front claws.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Wimpy AssistAlign AssistVnum

NPC.name: draconian youth
NPC.description: This draconian can't be more than two or three hours old, yet it is already four feet tall. It looks tired from the constant, rapid growth, but its muscles are already starting to develop underneath its scaly skin. It wobbles as it walks, but looks strong enough to be able to do some damage.
NPC.longDescription: A draconian youth walks about on wobbly legs.

NPC.name: draconian full grown adult fullgrown
NPC.description: This draconian must be full-grown by now. It is six and a half feet tall and it has an enormous tail behind it. Its red eyes glitter with hate and arrogance. The black magic has done its work ... this one is ready to be trained.
NPC.longDescription: A full-grown draconian looks at its younger siblings.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Warrior AssistAlign AssistVnum

NPC.name: necromancer blackrobe black necro
NPC.description: This necromancer apparently is unused to so many living things about him at once. A dagger flashes in his belt, caked with dried blood. He tries to smile, but only comes up with a wicked grin. This is a strange necromancer ... but powerful indeed, to be granted a ring of Takhisis.
NPC.longDescription: A necromancer stands here, looking about as if lost in the world of the living.

NPC.name: demon abyss fire
NPC.description: This demon is so horrible it could have only come from the Abyss, from the burning hatred in the heart of the Dark Queen.
NPC.longDescription: A demon of pure black fire burns uncontrollably.
NPC.shortDescription: a fire demon of the Abyss

NPC.name: demon shadow black abyss
NPC.description: As you look at it, it looks back at you with black, shadowed eyes. Nothing can be seen about it; as it moves about it blends in perfectly with the blackness.
NPC.longDescription: A shadow saunters slowly about.

NPC.name: goblin mercenary short
NPC.description: This goblin mercenary is one of the many hundreds hired by the Dragonarmy to build up their forces for an attack. He wears the traditional armor of a mercenary, hammered iron plate. He eyes you with disdain, and keeps walking about in the crowd.
NPC.longDescription: A goblin mercenary stands here, clad in iron armor.

NPC.name: dragon blue skie
NPC.description: This blue dragon is none other than Skie, mount of Kitiara. In battle, they act and feel as one, knowing what the other will do before they do it. Skie will defend Kitiara against any attack. They are faithful only to each other and to the Dark Queen.
NPC.longDescription: A massive blue dragon is here, eyeing you with severe disdain.

NPC.name: black dragon
NPC.description: This gigantic black dragon is the Black Highlord's dragon. Although he is faithful to the Black Highlord alone, it is more of a loyalty based on respect and fear than anything else. He is old and powerful, and therefore happy in his age. His black eyes glisten as he notices you invading his cell.
NPC.longDescription: A massive black dragon rears up on its hind legs to attack you.

NPC.name: red dragon
NPC.description: A dragon so mighty and powerful can be owned by anyone else but a Dragon Highlord. The Red Highlord knows this dragon almost as well as he knows himself, and that makes them terrifying in the air. On the ground, the dragon can fend for himself quite well with his deadly breath.
NPC.longDescription: A large red dragon is here, flame licking from his nostrils.

NPC.name: blue dragon
NPC.description: A dragon of dark blue is laying in front of you, severely disinterested in you. He only wants to get back out to true battle in the skies, and not stuck in a cage watching his rider. He doesn't even move to look at you for very long, just a roll of his eye.
NPC.longDescription: A dragon of dark blue stares at with with disinterest.

NPC.name: green dragon
NPC.description: Although her face is obscured by a greenish cloud of gas, you can see her sneer as she looks at you with anger. She only tolerates one man fully, and that is her master, the Green Highlord. As such, she hates you until you gain her master's approval ... but you won't, since she's about to kill you.
NPC.longDescription: An enormous green dragon is here, exhaling clouds of poison.

NPC.name: white dragon
NPC.description: This white dragon is always breathing out steam, since his breath is colder than anything around it. He's obviously uncomfortable, too, in this hot and cramped cell. But as you look at his body, he looks at you, and a light in his eyes says that he can forget the discomfort for a while as he plays ...
NPC.longDescription: A white dragon stands in a patch of frost, glaring at you suspiciously.

NPC.name: elf tortured blinded prisoner
NPC.description: He cannot see you and he doesn't know that you're here. All he knows is that he's blind and horrible things are being done all around him. Perhaps mercy is in order, perhaps not ...
NPC.longDescription: A tortured, blinded elf is crucified invertedly on the wall.

NPC.name: soldier draconian aurak
NPC.description: The Aurak is a draconian, and his golden skin and eyes give away the fact that he is different; indeed, he was made from a gold dragon's egg. Other than that, he's just another draconian among hundreds here, patrolling the hallways.
NPC.longDescription: An Aurak soldier patrols the area.

NPC.name: sivak soldier draconian
NPC.description: This Sivak is just another kind of draconian here. He wanders about with little interest, since there's nothing interesting going on. His claws click on the stone floor as he walks about. As you look at him, a glint of interest appears in his green eyes, but it quickly passes.
NPC.longDescription: A Sivak soldier's patrol brings him through this area.

NPC.name: bulmammon draconian aurak assassin
NPC.description: This can be none other than Bulmammon, the infamous Aurak assassin. His station in Neraka is permanent as long as people like you try to get in. He will kill without mercy, and has assassinated the likes of kings and dragons, so you will be easy work.
NPC.longDescription: A golden Aurak draconian lurks in the shadows, death in his hand.

NPC.name: skeleton undead
NPC.description: The undead ... this skeleton has a deep orange glow in its eyesockets, and that means powerful magic is afoot here. It moves with a strange grace, perhaps that of being freed from life and not having to fear death. It brandishes a sword in bony hands, ready to bring you to undeath.
NPC.longDescription: A skeleton stands undead, stripped of flesh and soul.

NPC.name: spectre undead blacksmith
NPC.description: It is the spectre of the blacksmith, held here by the Dark Queen's magic. It is angry and seeks revenge on all those who dare come near and disturb it.
NPC.longDescription: An undead spectre floats menacingly above the ground.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior Shopkeeper
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared PassDoor DetectIllusion DarkVision

NPC.name: wench girl serving barmaid maid
NPC.description: At one time, she could have been considered pretty and young, but now, she's aged far beyond her years. The only reason she stays here is because she has nowhere else to go and no money to get there.
NPC.longDescription: A barmaid balances a few mugs of ale on her tray and asks what you would like.

NPC.name: shopkeeper old man
NPC.description: He's old and tired, ready to move from this world. He knows his time to leave the mortal coil is coming soon, and so he chooses to live it out here, amidst all the hate and despair of his village of birth, corrupted long ago.
NPC.longDescription: An old, weary man sits behind the store counter.

Item.Name: crown
Item.LongDescription: The Crown lies covered in blood.

ExtraDescription.Description: The Crown is covered in blood, dripping from one certain red stone. As you look at it, an overwhelming sense of power grasps you.

Item.Name: gem green gemstone
Item.LongDescription: The Green Gemstone glistens, with bits of flesh hanging off the back.

Item.Name: pillar gem marble white
Item.LongDescription: A white marble pillar stands broken here, covered in glowing gemstones.

ExtraDescription.Description: The gems glow with an unearthly, almost evil hue. You sense great godly power coming from each of them, but also great evil power.

Item.Name: ale tankard
Item.LongDescription: There is a tankard of dark ale on the table.

Item.Name: whisky shot
Item.LongDescription: There is a small shot of whisky waiting for someone.

Item.Name: liquor jar glass
Item.LongDescription: There is a glass jar of liquor here.

Item.Name: snifter brandy
Item.LongDescription: There is a delicate snifter of brandy for the rich.

Item.Name: cordial light almond glass
Item.LongDescription: There is a small glass of light almond cordial here.

Item.Name: sword blade lightbane
Item.ShortDescription: a blade engraved with the Insignia of the Dark Queen
Item.LongDescription: A sword hovers above the ground, point down, immersed in shadow.
Item.ExtraFlags: Evil Magic NoDrop AntiGood AntiNeutral NoRemove

ExtraDescription.Description: It is plunged into shadow and appears to absorb the light around it completely. No light reflects off it, and the surface is eerily flat.

Item.Name: chicken leg
Item.LongDescription: There is a half-cooked chicken leg sitting in the dirt.

Item.Name: rack beef meat
Item.LongDescription: A large, bloody rack of beef is lying in its own juices.

Item.Name: leg lamb
Item.LongDescription: There is a fairly large leg of lamb detached from the lamb.

Item.Name: mixed goods meat
Item.LongDescription: Some various meats sit in a bloody pile.

Item.Name: fish massive blue
Item.LongDescription: There is a massive blue fish lying dead on the ground.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is an enormous fish, and it weighs a lot in your hand. The smell from it is horrible; it would do better as a weapon than food.

Item.Name: bottle amber beer
Item.LongDescription: A bottle of clear amber beer tempts you.

Item.Name: mead honey mug
Item.LongDescription: A big mug of honey mead is here.

Item.Name: bowl nuts
Item.LongDescription: A small wooden bowl of nondescript nuts sits on a table.

ExtraDescription.Description: The bowl is carved from wood, and the nuts are mixed.

Item.Name: ale mug
Item.LongDescription: There is a warm mug of ale close by.

Item.Name: key special daily
Item.LongDescription: A key labelled "the daily special" rests here.

ExtraDescription.Description: How odd ... it's a key ...

Item.Name: dagger bartender
Item.LongDescription: A bartender's dagger is jammed into the wood.

Item.Name: gemstone chromatic
Item.LongDescription: A single chromatic gemstone lays on the floor.

ExtraDescription.Description: It pulses and hums with all the colors of the chromatic dragons: red, green, blue, black and white. It has an aura of evil and darkness to it. As you look at it more closely, you can feel the colors swirling about, trying to drag you inside it.

Item.Name: chain mail white steel
Item.LongDescription: A suit of white steel chain mail lies in a pile on the floor.

Item.Name: white steel leggings
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of white steel leggings
Item.LongDescription: A pair of white steel leggings lie piled in a heap here.

Item.Name: steel broad sword white
Item.LongDescription: A steel broadsword has been tossed on the ground.

Item.Name: white steel gauntlets gloves
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of white steel gauntlets
Item.LongDescription: A pair of white steel-chain gauntlets lay folded together.

Item.Name: shard gem stone gemstone green
Item.LongDescription: A small shard of a green stone is barely noticeable.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks to be chipped off from some large emerald.

Item.Name: spear long black
Item.LongDescription: A long, black steel spear lies on the ground.

Item.Name: pole polearm long black
Item.LongDescription: A long, black steel polearm lies in the dust.

Item.Name: iron hammered hard plate
Item.LongDescription: A suit of hard hammered iron platemail lies on the floor.

Item.Name: hard hammered iron helm helmet
Item.LongDescription: A hard, hammered iron helmet collects dust.

Item.Name: hammered iron hard gauntlets gloves
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of hammered iron gauntlets
Item.LongDescription: A pair of hard iron gauntlets has been tossed down.

Item.Name: sword hammered iron sword
Item.LongDescription: A hammered iron sword is laying on the ground.

Item.Name: bow black long longbow
Item.LongDescription: A black longbow has been carelessly dropped.

Item.Name: whip slavemaster sadistic
Item.LongDescription: A sadistic-looking slavemaster's whip is coiled up in the corner.

ExtraDescription.Description: This evil-looking whip has seven tails, each with a barbed hook on it, so as to rip off a victim's skin forcefully, and from quite a distance, it's so long.

Item.Name: coinpurse coins
Item.LongDescription: A bulging coinpurse is about to tear from the coins it holds.

Item.Name: cot bed small
Item.LongDescription: A small cot is in the corner.

Item.Name: table long wooden
Item.LongDescription: A long, wooden table is set in the middle of the tent.
Item.ExtraFlags: NoPurge RestIn SleepAt SleepOn SleepIn PutAt PutOn PutIn

Item.Name: pot
Item.LongDescription: A pot full of boiling water is over a fire.

Item.Name: box rations
Item.LongDescription: A box of army rations has been dropped.

Item.Name: crate wooden large
Item.LongDescription: A large wooden crate is here, the top pried off.

Item.Name: meat boiled soggy
Item.LongDescription: A soggy piece of boiled meat has been left.

Item.Name: desk table
Item.LongDescription: A small wooden desk is in the middle of the tent.

Item.Name: paper paperwork assorted
Item.LongDescription: A large pile of assorted paperwork is about to be blown away.

ExtraDescription.Description: This looks boring ... thank the gods that you don't have this job.

Item.Name: papers paperwork reports
Item.ShortDescription: a pile of prisoner of war reports
Item.LongDescription: A pile of prisoner of war reports sits here.

ExtraDescription.Description: All these reports are mundane ... and all of the elf reports are marked, "DEATH."

Item.Name: papers paper paperwork reports leave
Item.ShortDescription: a pile of soldier leave reports
Item.LongDescription: A pile of soldier's leave reports are here.

ExtraDescription.Description: A stack of leave reports are here, with names scribbled all across them.

Item.Name: quiver arrows black
Item.LongDescription: A quiver full of black arrow lies on the floor.

Item.Name: apron bloody cook
Item.LongDescription: A bloody cook's apron is crumpled in a heap.

ExtraDescription.Description: How could a cook's apron get so bloody?

Item.Name: spoon large stirring
Item.LongDescription: A large dirty spoon is getting even dirtier on the ground.

Item.Name: bloody cleaver cook
Item.LongDescription: An enormous cleaver rests in a pool of blood.

ExtraDescription.Description: This thing is so big it could probably take a dragon's forearm off in one blow ... Dried black blood covers the blade and the handle. Fresher blood slowly oozes off the thing.

Item.Name: entrails lump bloody
Item.LongDescription: A lump of bloody entrails rots in a puddle of blood.

Item.Name: fountain black blood massive grotesque
Item.LongDescription: A massive grotesque black fountain is built in the center of the room, gurgling out blood.

ExtraDescription.Description: The fountain is carved from a single piece of utterly black stone, constantly spewing dark red blood. The blood spurts from a statue in the center, one of a decapitated elf. The statue's head lies at its feet, an expression of absolute horror on its face. Blood pours from the open mouth. It looks so real you could swear that the figure of the statue was once alive ...

Item.Name: key underhall
Item.LongDescription: A black key attached to a large keyring has been tossed down.

Item.Name: scimitar sword jailer thick
Item.LongDescription: A thick-bladed scimitar is on the floor.

Item.Name: altar black blackened
Item.LongDescription: A round blackened altar is centered in the room.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is made of obsidian and is inscribed with countless illegible runes and runescripts. Dark green slime covers the top and drips off the edges.

Item.Name: bed wooden hard
Item.LongDescription: A hard-looking bed is in the corner of the room.

Item.Name: ear elf
Item.LongDescription: The severed ear of an elf has been tossed down.

ExtraDescription.Description: It has a rune on the back of it ... a rune of cursing.

Item.Name: mace large bone spiked
Item.LongDescription: A large spiked mace sits on the ground.
Item.ExtraFlags: Hum Evil Invisibility Frost Sharp TwoHands Poison Unholy

ExtraDescription.Description: Instead of the many spikes of a morning star, it has nine large spikes surrounding the head. It looks to be a very powerful and evil weapon indeed.

Item.Name: wand black skull skeleton bone
Item.ShortDescription: a wand made from a bone and a skull
Item.LongDescription: A long wand lays here, made from a single bone and a small skull.

Item.Name: chest box small
Item.LongDescription: A small black chest is on the floor.

Item.Name: armor dragon dragonscale blue
Item.LongDescription: A suit of midnight-blue dragonscale armor rests on the floor.

Item.Name: armor black dragonscale dragon
Item.LongDescription: A suit of jet-black dragonscale armor has been dropped.

Item.Name: armor red dragonscale dragon
Item.LongDescription: A suit of deep red dragonscale armor has been tossed on the ground.

Item.Name: armor green dragonscale dragon
Item.LongDescription: A suit of dark green dragonscale armor is laying on the floor.

Item.Name: armor white dragonscale dragon
Item.LongDescription: A suit of cold white dragonscale armor is laying on the ground.

Item.Name: helmet helm blue dragonscale dragon
Item.LongDescription: A midnight-blue dragonscale helm is upturned on the ground.

Item.Name: black dragonscale helm dragon full
Item.LongDescription: A full helmet of jet-black dragonscale collects dust on the floor.

Item.Name: red dragonscale dragon helm
Item.LongDescription: A helm made from red dragonscale rests here.

Item.Name: green helmet dragon dragonscale
Item.LongDescription: A helmet made from bile-green dragonscale is on the ground.

Item.Name: white helmet dragonscale dragon
Item.LongDescription: An ice-white helmet of dragonscale has been left.

Item.Name: blue dragonscale dragon gauntlets
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of blue dragonscale gauntlets
Item.LongDescription: Two deep-blue dragonscale gauntlets have fallen here.

Item.Name: black dragonscale dragon gauntlets
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of black dragonscale gauntlets
Item.LongDescription: A pair of night-black dragonscale gauntlets lay here.

Item.Name: red dragonscale gloves dragon
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of red dragonscale gloves
Item.LongDescription: A pair of gloves made from red dragonscale are on the floor.

Item.Name: green gauntlets dragonscale dragon
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of green dragonscale gauntlets
Item.LongDescription: Some gauntlets of dark green dragonscale lie abandoned.

Item.Name: white gauntlets dragonscale dragon
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of white dragonscale gauntlets
Item.LongDescription: Two gauntlets of white dragonscale lie here.

Item.Name: blue dragonscale dragon armguards
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of blue dragonscale armguards
Item.LongDescription: A pair of midnight-blue dragonscale armguards lay together.

Item.Name: black dragonscale dragon armguards
Item.ShortDescription: a set of black dragonscale armguards
Item.LongDescription: A pair of black dragonscale armguards lay here.

Item.Name: red dragonscale armguards dragon
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of red dragonscale armguards
Item.LongDescription: A pair of dark red armguards of dragonscale lay unused.

Item.Name: green sleeves dragonscale dragon
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of green dragonscale sleeves
Item.LongDescription: A pair of flexible sleeves made from dark green dragonscale lie on the ground.

Item.Name: white sleeves dragonscale dragon
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of white dragonscale sleeves
Item.LongDescription: A pair of frosty white dragonscale sleeves lie in a pile.

Item.Name: blue boots dragonscale dragon
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of blue dragonscale boots
Item.LongDescription: A pair of blue dragonscale boots has been set down.

Item.Name: black boots dragonscale dragon
Item.LongDescription: A pair of black dragonscale boots has been dropped.

Item.Name: red boots dragonscale dragon
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of red dragonscale boots
Item.LongDescription: Two fire-red boots of dragonscale are laying on the ground.

Item.Name: green dragonscale dragon boots
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of green dragonscale boots
Item.LongDescription: Some green dragonscale boots have been carelessly left here.

Item.Name: white boots dragonscale dragon
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of white dragonscale boots
Item.LongDescription: Some white dragonscale boots have been dropped here.

Item.Name: chromatic armor dragonscale dragon
Item.ShortDescription: a suit of chromatic dragonscale armor
Item.LongDescription: A suit of chromatic dragonscale armor is on the ground.

Item.Name: chromatic helmet dragonscale dragon
Item.LongDescription: A chromatic dragonscale helm has fallen to the floor.

Item.Name: chromatic gauntlets dragonscale dragon
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of chromatic dragonscale gauntlets
Item.LongDescription: Two gauntlets of chromatic dragonscale lie unused in the corner.

Item.Name: chromatic armguards dragonscale dragon
Item.LongDescription: A pair of chromatic dragonscale armguards lie on the ground.

Item.Name: chromatic boots dragonscale dragon
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of chromatic dragonscale boots
Item.LongDescription: A pair of chromatic dragonscale boots sits here.

Item.Name: altar broken
Item.LongDescription: A massive altar is in the center of the room, broken in half.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is a long, black wooden altar, carved and engraved with many mystical symbols of strength and fear. However, the draconians who are training to be fighters have shattered it in half accidentally.

Item.Name: altar glowing
Item.LongDescription: A glowing altar is in the center of the room.

ExtraDescription.Description: This altar glows with an odd sort of light ... it's not really white, but it's not the evil light that's been surrounding you ever since you set foot in this Temple. You think a bit, then, looking at the runes on the altar, realize that this is the glow of pure magic.

Item.Name: egg dragon gold
Item.LongDescription: A bright gold dragon's egg has rolled out of its box.

ExtraDescription.Description: This golden orb pulses with life force and energy. It is a dragon's egg, one that will never hatch because of what was done to it by Takhisis' clerics. But the baby dragon still sleeps inside, only to be wakened by a spell ...

Item.Name: pit donation
Item.LongDescription: A pit for donations to Takhisis' Army has been carved into the floor here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This pit is deep and fairly wide, covering most of the floor space inside this narrow alcove.

Item.Name: amulet blind
Item.LongDescription: An amulet depicting a closed eye lays on the ground.
Item.ExtraFlags: Hum Evil Magic NoDrop NoRemove BurnProof

ExtraDescription.Description: The eye on this amulet is closed, and as you touch it, you feel your sight starting to blur. Maybe it's not a good idea to wear it.

Item.Name: shield blue dragon dragonscale
Item.ShortDescription: a shield forged with evil intent
Item.LongDescription: An elaborate shield made of blue dragonscale is laying in the corner.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is outlined in pure silver, bearing two crests. One is five clenched dragon claws, and the second is a stylized blue dragon. Behind them both is the coat of arms of the Majere family.

Item.Name: scroll necromancy black
Item.LongDescription: A black scroll mysteriously floats a few feet above the ground.

Item.Name: box metal crate large
Item.LongDescription: A large metal crate stands in the corner, full of various weapons.

Item.Name: scimitar sword curved blade blue lightning
Item.LongDescription: A curved blade lies here, blue as the midnight sky.

ExtraDescription.Description: A stylized bolt of silver lightning runs the length of the blade, embossed with tiny golden runes.

Item.Name: dagger assassin claw
Item.LongDescription: You barely notice the dagger laying on the floor, made from a detached claw.

Item.Name: box strong beaten steel
Item.LongDescription: A beaten steel strong box lies anchored in rubble.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's made of very hard steel and looks like it could take quite a beating, which it already has. The contents are probably intact, then, too.

Item.Name: mixed pill pills fused
Item.LongDescription: A few pills sit fused together.

ExtraDescription.Description: They all look quite different ... wonder what kind of effect they might have?

Item.Name: potion flask remnants
Item.LongDescription: A flask of assorted remnants of potions is bubbling rapidly.

ExtraDescription.Description: The liquids refuse to mix one moment, then combine the next, all the while bubbling unstably. A wave of nervousness washes over you as you contemplate quaffing it down.

Item.Name: bottle mixed brew brews
Item.LongDescription: A bottle of mixed brews shudders of its own instability.

ExtraDescription.Description: This bottle vibrates and hums rapidly ... perhaps it's unstable, perhaps it's very powerful. Who can say?

Item.Name: powder dust packet colorful
Item.LongDescription: A small packet of colorful dust collects even more dust at your feet.

ExtraDescription.Description: What an odd little thing to have.

Item.Name: pills fused
Item.LongDescription: A few pills have been melted together into a lumpy mass.

ExtraDescription.Description: They look like you can't pull them apart ... and they look like they'd be uncomfortable as you swallowed them.

Item.Name: throne seat white
Item.LongDescription: The White Highlord's Throne is raised above the ground.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is a pure ebony throne, with white cushions and backing, and inlaid with the purest silver.

Item.Name: throne seat green
Item.LongDescription: The Green Highlord's Throne is raised above floor level.

ExtraDescription.Description: The throne is constructed of ebony, with sharp green cushions and beautiful gold inlay.

Item.Name: throne seat red
Item.LongDescription: The Throne of Ariakas is raised far above the floor.

ExtraDescription.Description: The throne is carved from ebony, with blood-red cushioning and backing, and inset with rubies and white gold.

Item.Name: throne blue seat kitiara
Item.LongDescription: The Blue Highlord's Throne is raised slightly higher than the other thrones.

ExtraDescription.Description: The throne is built from ebony wood, and the cushion is midnight-blue, accented with bright silver.

Item.Name: throne seat black
Item.LongDescription: A Throne of burning night is carved out of the wall.

ExtraDescription.Description: The Throne is ebony wood, and it radiates evil. The cushions are non-existent, and nothing but onyx and blood-ruby accentuate it. This throne is for someone very special ...

Item.Name: metal blob chunk
Item.LongDescription: A large chunk of solidified metal is against a wall.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks as if it can be pried open.

Item.Name: axe forge hammer flattened
Item.LongDescription: A flattened forge-hammer lies in soot, blade wedged in.

ExtraDescription.Description: The hammer head has been melted and crushed to form a crude but enormous axe head, a sword's length wide.

Item.Name: key copper melted
Item.LongDescription: A melted key of copper is coated with black soot.

ExtraDescription.Description: It still looks usable.

Item.Name: table small chairs wooden
Item.LongDescription: A small wooden table is in the corner, surrounded by four chairs.
Item.ExtraFlags: NoPurge BurnProof RestIn SleepAt SleepOn SleepIn PutAt PutOn PutIn

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks accomodating enough for a short rest.

Item.Name: coin silver
Item.LongDescription: A glinting disc catches your eye.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks strange ... on one side are the three heads of a chimera, and on the other side is a shield.

Item.Name: dried beef piece
Item.LongDescription: A small piece of dried beef lays on the floor.

Item.Name: canteen small
Item.LongDescription: A small canteen has been dropped.

Item.Name: canteen large
Item.LongDescription: A large canteen lies in the corner.

Item.Name: stick walking wooden
Item.LongDescription: A long, sturdy walking stick has been thrown aside.

Item.Name: black robes necromancer
Item.ShortDescription: the black robes of a necromancer
Item.LongDescription: A pile of soft black cloth lays discarded.
Item.ExtraFlags: Hum Evil Magic NoDrop AntiGood AntiNeutral
